thread.title: Single mum who blew £6,000 on ‘rubbish’ after being given £26,000 benefits handout struggles to get hairdressing business off the ground after just FOUR people turn up to launch party
thread.title_full: Single mum who blew £6,000 on ‘rubbish’ after being given £26,000 benefits handout struggles to get hairdressing business off the ground after just FOUR people turn up to launch party

author: lwindle
title: Single mum who blew £6,000 on ‘rubbish’ after being given £26,000 benefits handout struggles to get hairdressing business off the ground after just FOUR people turn up to launch party
text:
Mrs Crunch HEY BIG SPENDER Single mum who blew £6,000 on ‘rubbish’ after being given £26,000 benefits handout struggles to get hairdressing business off the ground after just FOUR people turn up to launch party 
Donna, 38, was given £26,000 by the show in order to help her come off benefits and go into the working world By LAUREN WINDLE
